properties.name: parent
properties.description: The object's container.

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: justification
properties.description: Paragraph justification.

properties.name: firstLineIndent
properties.description: First line left indent expressed in points.

properties.name: leftIndent
properties.description: Left indent of margin expressed in points.

properties.name: rightIndent
properties.description: Right indent of margin expressed in points.

properties.name: spaceBefore
properties.description: Spacing before paragraph in points.

properties.name: spaceAfter
properties.description: Spacing after paragraph in points.

properties.name: hyphenation
properties.description: Is hyphenation enabled for the paragraph?

properties.name: minimumHyphenatedWordSize
properties.description: Minimum hyphenated word size.

properties.name: minimumBeforeHyphen
properties.description: Minimum number of characters before a hyphen.

properties.name: minimumAfterHyphen
properties.description: Minimum number of characters after a hyphen.

properties.name: maximumConsecutiveHyphens
properties.description: Maximum number of consecutive hypenated lines.

properties.name: hyphenationZone
properties.description: Size of the hyphenation zone.

properties.name: hyphenateCapitalizedWords
properties.description: Is hyphenation enabled for the capitalized words?

properties.name: hyphenationPreference
properties.description: Hyphenation preference scale for better spacing (0) or fewer hyphens (1)

properties.name: desiredWordSpacing
properties.description: Desired word spacing expressed as a percentage.

properties.name: maximumWordSpacing
properties.description: Maximum word spacing expressed as a percentage.

properties.name: minimumWordSpacing
properties.description: Minimum word spacing expressed as a percentage.

properties.name: desiredLetterSpacing
properties.description: Desired letter spacing expressed as a percentage.

properties.name: maximumLetterSpacing
properties.description: Maximum letter spacing expressed as a percentage.

properties.name: minimumLetterSpacing
properties.description: Minimum letter spacing expressed as a percentage.

properties.name: desiredGlyphScaling
properties.description: Desired glyph scaling expressed as a percentage.

properties.name: maximumGlyphScaling
properties.description: Maximum glyph scaling expressed as a percentage.

properties.name: minimumGlyphScaling
properties.description: Minimum glyph scaling expressed as a percentage.

properties.name: singleWordJustification
properties.description: Single word justification.

properties.name: autoLeadingAmount
properties.description: Auto leading amount (in percentage)

properties.name: leadingType
properties.description: Auto leading type.

properties.name: tabStops
properties.description: Tab stop settings.

properties.name: romanHanging
properties.description: Is Roman hanging punctuation enabled?

properties.name: bunriKinshi
properties.description: Is BunriKinshi enabled?

properties.name: burasagariType
properties.description: The Burasagari type.

properties.name: kinsokuOrder
properties.description: The preferred Kinsoku order.

properties.name: kurikaeshiMojiShori
properties.description: Is KurikaeshiMojiShori enabled?

properties.name: kinsoku
properties.description: The Kinsoku Shori name.

properties.name: mojikumi
properties.description: The Mojikumi name.

properties.name: everyLineComposer
properties.description: Whether to enable every line composer (as opposed to single line composer)?
